name: 黃漢申
objective:
本科目所探討的內容包括: 
1. Sets and Propositions 
2. Computability and Formal Language 
3. Permutations, Combinations, and Discrete Probability 
4. Relations and Functions  
5. Graphs and Planar Graphs 
6. Trees and Cut-sets 
7. Finite State Machine 
8. Analysis of Algorithms 
9. Discrete Numeric Functions and Generating Functions
10.Recurrence Relations and Recursive Algorithms 
11.Groups and Rings
12.Boolean Algebras
schedule:
Week 1 : Sets and Propositions
Week 2 : Computability and Formal Language 
Week 3 : Permutations, Combinations, and Discrete Probability 
Week 4 : Relations and Functions  
Week 5 : Graphs and Planar Graphs 
Week 6 : Graphs and Planar Graphs 
Week 7 : Trees and Cut-sets 
Week 8 : Trees and Cut-sets 
Week 9 : 期中考
Week 10: Finite State Machine 
Week 11: Analysis of Algorithms 
Week 12: Discrete Numeric Functions and Generating Functions 
Week 13: Recurrence Relations and Recursive Algorithms 
Week 14: Groups and Rings
Week 15: Groups and Rings
Week 16: Boolean Algebras
Week 17: Boolean Algebras
Week 18: 期末考
scorePolicy:
作業 30%
期中考 30%
期末考 40%
materials: C. L. Liu: ”Elements of Discrete Mathematics,” 2/e, McGraw-Hill.
